Class
Description
BadGameTokenException
Exception that indicates bad player input format
BadMoveException
Exception that indicates bad player input
Card
Class implementing a standard card
Card.Rank
Enum data class to make card handling easier and faster

Enum data class to make card handling easier and faster
CardTest
Test class
Client
Class that manages communication with game server
ClientApp
Class with main function, which runs client terminal application
CommunicationConstants
Data class with constants needed for comunication
Deck
Class deck implements methods that make using a 52 card deck and easier task
DeckTest
Test class
Game
Class to hold and manage information about game
GameManager
Class to manage game logic and control game information Defaults: ante = 2 startingMoney = 100
GameManager.GamePhase
Enum class to control game flow
GameManagerTest
Test class
GameMove
Class to transfer data between classes and to check if player inputs are legal
GameMove.GameMoveType
Enum class for checking move viability
GameMoveTest
Test class
GameServer
Class that manages poker server, game and communication with clients
GameServerApp
Class with main function, operates with GameServer class
GameTest
Test class
GameToken
Class to check if player input is in good format
GameTokenTest
Test class
Hands
Class implementing checking hands for patterns
Hands.Hand
Enum class for comparing hand types
HandsTest
Test class
InvalidPlayerIdException
Exceptions class that indicates that given player name isn't valid or is already taken
Player
Class to hold and manage information about players cards and money

Test class
TerminalPrinter
Logger made for both client and server
